commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 8 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

fragments.text: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 8 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

message.body: You can type !savingmacroshelp to learn how to save and execute saved macros.

fragments.text: You can type !savingmacroshelp to learn how to save and execute saved macros.

message.body: We have a Discord server and there are currently some polls up for which game to be played after this (In roughly 4 months after Super Mario RPG ends, date yet to be defined) and for how long Super Mario RPG post game should last, Discord server link here: https://discord.gg/yHETNuZCUK

message.body: Not sure how to play? You can type !help or !commands in chat at any time to have a help message sent straight to chat.
